Dakota
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Dakota installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Dakota, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Dakota/6.16.0-foss-2021b
```
